title: Loves Deception
description: Henry Ricks has his share of problems: a failed business, a possessive ex-wife, a dead-end job, and he’s not sure he’ll ever get his life back on track.Then Mabel Young moves into town.She’s smart, confident, sexy, an amazing shot with a pistol, and it seems that everyone wants her, including the FBI.Will love be enough as Mabel’s world comes crashing into Henry’s?Set in the near future, Loves Deception is a thrill ride of twists and turns from start to finish.
author: Clark Chamberlain
